entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brooks 10:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -18.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 80 over southern sections late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
